We<S>2249</S> then<S>1161</S> that are strong<S>1415</S> ought<S>3784</S> to bear<S>941</S> the infirmities<S>771</S> of the weak<S>102</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> to please<S>700</S> ourselves<S>1438</S>.
<S>1063</S> Let<S>700</S> every one<S>1538</S> of us<S>2257</S> please<S>700</S> his neighbour<S>4139</S> for<S>1519</S> his good<S>18</S> to<S>4314</S> edification<S>3619</S>.
For<S>1063</S> even<S>2532</S> Christ<S>5547</S> pleased<S>700</S> not<S>3756</S> himself<S>1438</S>; but<S>235</S>, as<S>2531</S> it is written<S>1125</S>, The reproaches<S>3680</S> of them that reproached<S>3679</S> thee<S>4571</S> fell<S>1968</S> on<S>1909</S> me<S>1691</S>.
For<S>1063</S> whatsoever things<S>3745</S> were written aforetime<S>4270</S> were written<S>4270</S> for<S>1519</S> our<S>2251</S> learning<S>1319</S>, that<S>2443</S> we<S>2192</S> through<S>1223</S> patience<S>5281</S> and<S>2532</S> comfort<S>3874</S> of the scriptures<S>1124</S> might have<S>2192</S> hope<S>1680</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> the God<S>2316</S> of patience<S>5281</S> and<S>2532</S> consolation<S>3874</S> grant<S>1325</S> you<S>5213</S> to be<S>846</S> likeminded<S>5426</S> one<S>240</S> toward another<S>1722</S> <S>240</S> according<S>2596</S> to Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>: <sup>according to: or, after the example of</sup>
That<S>2443</S> ye may<S>1392</S> with one mind<S>3661</S> and <S>1722</S> one<S>1520</S> mouth<S>4750</S> glorify<S>1392</S> God<S>2316</S>, even<S>2532</S> the Father<S>3962</S> of our<S>2257</S> Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
Wherefore<S>1352</S> receive ye<S>4355</S> one another<S>240</S>, as<S>2531</S> <S>2532</S> Christ<S>5547</S> also<S>2531</S> received<S>4355</S> us<S>2248</S> to<S>1519</S> the glory<S>1391</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> I say<S>3004</S> that Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> was<S>1096</S> a minister<S>1249</S> of the circumcision<S>4061</S> for<S>5228</S> the truth<S>225</S> of God<S>2316</S>, to<S>1519</S> confirm<S>950</S> the promises<S>1860</S> made unto the fathers<S>3962</S>:
And<S>1161</S> that the Gentiles<S>1484</S> might glorify<S>1392</S> God<S>2316</S> for<S>5228</S> his mercy<S>1656</S>; as<S>2531</S> it is written<S>1125</S>, For<S>1223</S> this<S>5124</S> cause<S>1223</S> I will confess<S>1843</S> to thee<S>4671</S> among<S>1722</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S>, and<S>2532</S> sing<S>5567</S> unto thy<S>4675</S> name<S>3686</S>.
And<S>2532</S> again<S>3825</S> he saith<S>3004</S>, Rejoice, ye<S>2165</S> Gentiles<S>1484</S>, with<S>3326</S> his<S>846</S> people<S>2992</S>.
And<S>2532</S> again<S>3825</S>, Praise<S>134</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>, all<S>3956</S> ye<S>134</S> Gentiles<S>1484</S>; and<S>2532</S> laud<S>1867</S> him<S>846</S>, all ye<S>3956</S> people<S>2992</S>.
And<S>2532</S> again<S>3825</S>, Esaias<S>2268</S> saith<S>3004</S>, There shall be<S>2071</S> a root<S>4491</S> of Jesse<S>2421</S>, and<S>2532</S> he that shall rise<S>450</S> to reign over<S>757</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S>; in<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S> shall<S>1679</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S> trust<S>1679</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> the God<S>2316</S> of hope<S>1680</S> fill<S>4137</S> you<S>5209</S> with all<S>3956</S> joy<S>5479</S> and<S>2532</S> peace<S>1515</S> in<S>1722</S> believing<S>4100</S>, that<S>1519</S> ye<S>5209</S> may abound<S>4052</S> in<S>1722</S> hope<S>1680</S>, through<S>1722</S> the power<S>1411</S> of the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>.
And<S>1161</S> I<S>1473</S> myself<S>846</S> also<S>2532</S> am persuaded<S>3982</S> of<S>4012</S> you<S>5216</S>, my<S>3450</S> brethren<S>80</S>, that<S>3754</S> ye<S>846</S> also<S>2532</S> are<S>2075</S> full<S>3324</S> of goodness<S>19</S>, filled<S>4137</S> with all<S>3956</S> knowledge<S>1108</S>, able<S>1410</S> also<S>2532</S> to admonish<S>3560</S> one another<S>240</S>.
Nevertheless<S>1161</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, I have written<S>1125</S> the more boldly<S>5112</S> unto you<S>5213</S> in<S>575</S> some sort<S>3313</S>, as<S>5613</S> putting<S>1878</S> you<S>5209</S> in mind<S>1878</S>, because<S>1223</S> of the grace<S>5485</S> that is given<S>1325</S> to me<S>3427</S> of<S>5259</S> God<S>2316</S>,
That I<S>3165</S> should be<S>1519</S> <S>1511</S> the minister<S>3011</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> to<S>1519</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S>, ministering<S>2418</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of God<S>2316</S>, that<S>2443</S> the offering up<S>4376</S> of the Gentiles<S>1484</S> might be<S>1096</S> acceptable<S>2144</S>, being sanctified<S>37</S> by<S>1722</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>. <sup>offering up: or, sacrificing</sup>
I have<S>2192</S> therefore whereof<S>3767</S> I may glory<S>2746</S> through<S>1722</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> in those things which pertain to<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S>.
For<S>1063</S> I will<S>5111</S> not<S>3756</S> dare<S>5111</S> to speak<S>2980</S> of any<S>5100</S> of those things which<S>3739</S> Christ<S>5547</S> hath<S>2716</S> not<S>3756</S> wrought<S>2716</S> by<S>1223</S> me<S>1700</S>, to make<S>1519</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S> obedient<S>5218</S>, by word<S>3056</S> and<S>2532</S> deed<S>2041</S>,
Through<S>1722</S> mighty<S>1411</S> signs<S>4592</S> and<S>2532</S> wonders<S>5059</S>, by<S>1722</S> the power<S>1411</S> of the Spirit<S>4151</S> of God<S>2316</S>; so<S>5620</S> that from<S>575</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>, and<S>2532</S> round about<S>2945</S> unto<S>3360</S> Illyricum<S>2437</S>, I<S>3165</S> have fully preached<S>4137</S> the gospel<S>2098</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>.
Yea<S>1161</S>, so<S>3779</S> have I strived<S>5389</S> to preach the gospel<S>2097</S>, not<S>3756</S> where<S>3699</S> Christ<S>5547</S> was named<S>3687</S>, lest<S>3363</S> I should build<S>3618</S> upon<S>1909</S> another man's<S>245</S> foundation<S>2310</S>:
But<S>235</S> as<S>2531</S> it is written<S>1125</S>, To whom<S>3739</S> he<S>846</S> was<S>312</S> not<S>3756</S> spoken<S>312</S> of<S>4012</S>, they shall see<S>3700</S>: and<S>2532</S> they<S>3739</S> that have<S>191</S> not<S>3756</S> heard<S>191</S> shall understand<S>4920</S>.
For which cause<S>1352</S> also<S>2532</S> I have been<S>1465</S> much<S>4183</S> hindered<S>1465</S> from coming<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>. <sup>much: or, many ways, or oftentimes</sup>
But<S>1161</S> now<S>3570</S> having<S>2192</S> no more<S>3371</S> place<S>5117</S> in<S>1722</S> these<S>575</S> <S>5125</S> parts<S>2824</S>, and<S>1161</S> having<S>2192</S> a great desire<S>1974</S> these many<S>4183</S> years<S>2094</S> to come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>;
Whensoever<S>5613</S> <S>1437</S> I take my journey<S>4198</S> into<S>1519</S> Spain<S>4681</S>, I will come<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>: for<S>1063</S> I trust<S>1679</S> to see<S>2300</S> you<S>5209</S> in my journey<S>1279</S>, and<S>2532</S> to be brought on my way<S>4311</S> thitherward<S>1563</S> by<S>5259</S> you<S>5216</S>, if<S>1437</S> first<S>4412</S> I be<S>1705</S> somewhat<S>3313</S> filled<S>1705</S> with<S>575</S> your<S>5216</S> company. <sup>with: Gr. with you</sup>
But<S>1161</S> now<S>3570</S> I go<S>4198</S> unto<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S> to minister<S>1247</S> unto the saints<S>40</S>.
For<S>1063</S> it hath pleased them<S>2106</S> of Macedonia<S>3109</S> and<S>2532</S> Achaia<S>882</S> to make<S>4160</S> a certain<S>5100</S> contribution<S>2842</S> for<S>1519</S> the poor<S>4434</S> saints<S>40</S> which<S>3588</S> are at<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>.
It hath pleased them<S>2106</S> verily<S>1063</S>; and<S>2532</S> their<S>846</S> debtors<S>3781</S> they are<S>1526</S>. For<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S> have been made partakers<S>2841</S> of their<S>846</S> spiritual things<S>4152</S>, their duty is<S>3784</S> also<S>2532</S> to minister<S>3008</S> unto them<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> carnal things<S>4559</S>.
When therefore<S>3767</S> I have performed<S>2005</S> this<S>5124</S>, and<S>2532</S> have sealed<S>4972</S> to them<S>846</S> this<S>5126</S> fruit<S>2590</S>, I will come<S>565</S> by<S>1223</S> you<S>5216</S> into<S>1519</S> Spain<S>4681</S>.
And<S>1161</S> I am sure<S>1492</S> that<S>3754</S>, when I come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S>, I shall come<S>2064</S> in<S>1722</S> the fulness<S>4138</S> of the blessing<S>2129</S> of the gospel<S>2098</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> I beseech<S>3870</S> you<S>5209</S>, brethren<S>80</S>, for<S>1223</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ's<S>5547</S> sake<S>2257</S>, and<S>2532</S> for<S>1223</S> the love<S>26</S> of the Spirit<S>4151</S>, that ye strive together<S>4865</S> with me<S>3427</S> in<S>1722</S> your prayers<S>4335</S> to<S>4314</S> God<S>2316</S> for<S>5228</S> me<S>1700</S>;
That<S>2443</S> I may be delivered<S>4506</S> from<S>575</S> them that do not believe<S>544</S> in<S>1722</S> Judaea<S>2449</S>; and<S>2532</S> that<S>2443</S> my<S>3450</S> service<S>1248</S> which<S>3588</S> I have for<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S> may be<S>1096</S> accepted<S>2144</S> of the saints<S>40</S>; <sup>do not: or, are disobedient</sup>
That<S>2443</S> I may come<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> you<S>5209</S> with<S>1722</S> joy<S>5479</S> by<S>1223</S> the will<S>2307</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> may<S>4875</S> with you<S>5213</S> be refreshed<S>4875</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> the God<S>2316</S> of peace<S>1515</S> be with<S>3326</S> you<S>5216</S> all<S>3956</S>. Amen<S>281</S>.
